feed.title: Fwd: Bitcoin Core trial balloon: splitting blockchain engine and wallet

entry.title: Fwd: Bitcoin Core trial balloon: splitting blockchain engine and wallet
entry.summary: In this email exchange from 2014, William Yager suggests running the network part of the core as a system service may make sense for server implementations but not for most users. Wladimir responds by saying that making it a possibility wouldn't affect other use cases and questions if William is arguing just for the sake of arguing. No further context or information is provided beyond this email exchange.
